alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 2:54PM CDT until August 08 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Koochiching County in north central Minnesota... Northwestern St. Louis County in northeastern Minnesota... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 254 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kabetogama, or 16 miles southeast of International Falls, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kabetogama around 305 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Kabetogama Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
